name: ASSOCIATION OF DENTAL SUPPORT ORGANIZATIONS
sampleDescriptions: Provide counsel and strategic guidance on legislation or regulations that may impact dental service organizations.
Provide counsel and strategic guidance on legislation or regulations that may impact dental service organizations including the CARES Act Provider Relief Fund
Provide counsel and strategic guidance on legislation or regulations that may impact dental service organizations including the CARES Act Provider Relief Fund and Build Back Better Act

Provide counsel and strategic guidance on legislation or regulations that may impact dental service organizations including the OSHA vaccine mandates and healthcare ETS, Medicaid, and the No Surprises Act.
